greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, related to binary partitions of n.
formula: Let L(n) = (length of binary representation of n) - 0^n then
T(n, k) = n if k=0 else n - 2^(k-1) for n >= 0 and 0 <= k <= L(n).
maple: A295508_row := proc(n) local i, s, z; s := n; i := n-1; z := 1;
while 0 <= i do s := s,i; i := i-z; z := z+z od; s end:
results.author: _Peter Luschny_, Nov 30 2017
